snippet: Lionel Richie, the former Commodores frontman-turned-solo singer-songwriter, will be inducted into the Apollo Theater's Legends Hall of Fame in June, along with Etta James.
abstract: Lionel Richie, the former Commodores frontman-turned-solo singer-songwriter, will be inducted into the Apollo Theater's Legends Hall of Fame in June, along with Etta James.

headline.main: Lionel Richie to Enter Apollo Theater Hall of Fame, and Then, He Says, 'An Epidemic of Duets'
headline.print_headline: Richie to Enter Apollo Theater Hall of Fame
